name: Planet Runner (Ryder Studios)
description:
In this game you've to dodge objects on a shrinking planet.

How can I control this game?

 -Spacebar to jump

How this fits in the theme of the Blackthornprod game jam 3?

- Less size is more Challenge (the theme was Less Is More)

Everything was made by Daniel Münstermann and some usefull tools (sfx maker, eccrett music).
